/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import Logo from "../img/logo.png"; import Search from "../img/search.png"; import Cart from "../img/cart.png"; import Member from "../img/member.png"; import { useState } from "react"; function Header() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const handleToggle = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); } // 使用者搜尋 const [searchInput,setSearchInput]=useState(''); const inputSubmit=(event)=>{ setSearchInput(event.target.value) } const search=()=>{ if(searchInput===''){ alert('請輸入') }else{ window.location.href = `/products.html?keyword=${searchInput}` } } return (
女裝 男裝 配件

1

); } export default Header;
